name: Clean SEO Slugs
author: Muhammad Alyas

sections.description:
This plug-in will remove MS word’s smart quotes, special characters, symbols, common words (e.g. i, you, the, this, to, from etc.) from your Post Title and will make clean and Search Engines friendly slug.

A brief Markdown Example

Visit http://xblurb.com/clean-seo-slugs-wordpress-plugin for more details
